评论详情: Was surprised by the nice weight this necklace has, it's very sturdy, has nice weight to it, has held up great to everyday wear, easy to clean and looks very nice.
I absolutely love my choker, although I did shorten it more and wish it would have came with 2 keys instead of just one; either way I love it!!
Shipped fast and loved it when in put it on. My partner also loves it.

评论概述: Fits description, no fading or tarnish
评论详情: I bought this to go with Halloween costume and now it hangs from my rearview mirror. It's heavyweight and hasn't tarnished.

I love the quality.. Seemed like it would have been a nice necklace. Only thing is when I unlocked it.The whole thing fell apart and I lost all the parts so I got to try it on and then it broke.Now it sits on my table.

I will say that I did experience some user error because I accidentally let the heart come out of the other heart and now I cant get it back in - but if it came out it has to be able to go back in LOL. So despite that, its an adorable necklace that nods to certain extracurriculars

This is a really cute necklace and I love hearts so this is what caught my attention, I also like the design of it too. I like that you can slip it over your head if you don’t have big he’d, or use the key to unlock the heart and take it off. It’s good quality too, I was not expecting it to made of such good quality. Ppl kept asking where I got it and even my sis went and ordered her one.
